name: PhillyRails
0:
”Alexa, ask Philly Rails for the times from PHILMONT to SUBURBAN STATION”
”Alexa, ask Philly Rails whats the next train from PHILMONT to SUBURBAN STATION”
”Alexa, ask Philly Rails if my train from PHILMONT to SUBURBAN STATION is late”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: philly rails
des: Get real time data on philadelphia's regional train times and delays. An Alexa app for checking train arrival times for Philadelphia's Regional rails system. Simply Ask "Alexa, ask philly rails for the times from PHILMONT to SUBURBAN STATION" and it will return with the next time the that train departs your station and what is their delay status.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
